cause.description:
To promote understanding and cooperation between Jews and Christians and to build broad support for Israel and other shared concerns. Our vision is that Jews and Christians will reverse their 2,000-year history of discord and replace it with a relationship marked by dialogue, understanding, respect and cooperation.
1. Support the State of Israel
2. Support their efforts to fight terrorism
3. Support more cooperation between Jews and Christians
cause.mission: Jews and Christians united in support of the lone democracy in the Middle East, Israel.
cause.name: Support the State of Israel
